9-5.title: 9-to-5 mode
9-5.about: This will only activate blurring from 9:00 AM to 17:00 your local time, and deactive Pixelify outside working hours by default.

range.title: Range mode
range.about: You can specify range of your working times. Outside that range, Pixelify will be disabled

about.pixelify: Reduce quality of image by averaging pixels between large chunks.
about.darken: Scale luminosity of entire image relatively to it's overall luminosity. This way, colors do not collapse and details remain.
